author: shuston
msg: Add hybrid SQL-CLFS store that can be used on Windows systems Vista, Win Server 2008 and up - these have the Common Log File System facility. The CLFS store uses CLFS to store/recover messages and transactions instead of SQL. SQL still holds queues, bindings, exchanges, configs.
